job_title: Business Solution Consultant with Program Manager
jd: Hello; Business Solutions Consultant Remote Duration : Initial 3 months possible extension Will be evaluating the strategic direction for Executive Reporting. Gather requirements from business users, understand reporting options, plot existing capabilities to required & desired features to options. Determine cost/benefit of options.An individual with the software package selection process may align with this workThe CSR product is relatively old and fragile. There is a request to:Enumerate the current features/functions of the CSR productWork with stakeholders to identify any existing gaps/pain pointsEvaluate an alternative that may be introduced as part of the Elevate projectDo a side-by-side comparison of features/capabilities of the existing and Elevate alternative against features identified in 1&2Determine cost of operating each solutionProvide a summary recommendationIn our old consulting practice, this was generally an IT Architect with some business consulting skills. We did 'package selection' engagements to help our clients to pick a system to support some part of their operations (i.e. Workday vs. Oracle vs. SAP for HCM)
